title: sharavaNabhava ena oru
sahitya:
sharavaNabhava ena oru muraiyEnum uraittAl uLLam uruguvAn murugan


anupallavi

  aravaNaittanbarai Adarikkum avanadu tiruvaDit-tuNai tanai peravE dinamum


caraNam    parama sukham tanaip-peruvadadarkk-udavum uru tuNai tandiDum tiru mantiram adu
tirai kaDal karaiyin arugil amarndiDum arumukhattayyanai paravashappaDuttum
